Pain, lots of pain! (Talking about my hands)

::::

The drunk opens his mouth to reply to Repungus when the sword in his hand starts talking to him. His eyes widen slightly, his mind making a mental note to quit drinking, but he doesn't lose his grip on the sword.

"Err, did that sword just talk to me?" he asks Repungus in a voice clearly belonging to a fighter, his missile launcher firing another missile at the rubble. He holds the sword and shield steady though, keeping his scanners locked on Branded.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop ---
> 
> Pacifix keeps trying to remove the metallic rubble that recently fell 
> on him.
> 
> Crossroads fits perfectly into new bot's hands. "Hello, I'm 
> Crossroads. The weapon and shield are a plasma sword and 
> shield. They are both light and you should have no problem using 
> them to defeat enemies. The plasma blade will become surrounded 
> in miniature bluish flames when you begin to use it. When 
> damaging enemies, it causes blade damage plus the bluish flames 
> will stick to the damaged area, and cause excruciating pain, 
> without inflicting more damage. The shield has a moderate ability 
> to absorbe heat. Use them wisely, for your sake and mine." He 
> chuckles.
> 
> Swoop dodges weapon fire and the collapsing ceiling, then leaps 
> into flight. He circles wildly around the small room, looking for a 
> new target, but not wanting to hurt any friends.
